title: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis signs bill banning "picketing and protesting" outside a private residence

sentence: Florida protesters who picket outside a person's private home could face jail time and fines under a bill signed by Governor Ron DeSantis.
author: Jake Thomas
title: Ron DeSantis Signs Law Making it Illegal to Protest Outside a Private Home
